title: My University placed a hold on my account and locked me out of the student portal, while I was still attending, can I sue?
question: All my loans were paid in my consolidation included their University. I need my transcripts to gain employment. Should I pay them through collections, settlement. By the way it is already off my credit report, I just need access to transcripts.
answers:
University has right to restrict access to student accounts if SL in arrears.
Hire an attorney to negotiate for you.
You may pay SL arrears any way you wish.
